name: Fleur Defense
description:
Cast a vote for us in Ludum Dare 46!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/fleur-defense

Quarantine is no problem for Lizette Fleur; she has a garden to tend to! She can spend hours in her beloved greenhouse, but what’s this..? Where are all these bugs coming from? Good thing Fleur dabbles in the art of growing weaponized plants because it’s going to come in handy. Don’t let those nasty bugs get to your prized Giant Jade Blossom! Buy smaller potted plants and keep them watered to help protect it from the pests. Don’t let them destroy your lemon trees either, those lemons are valuable.

  1. If your prized flower is destroyed, it’s game over
  2. Plants can be bought and sold at the shop
  3. Swing at the lemon trees to collect valuable citrus goodness
  4. Make sure your plants are watered or they’ll perish
  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Left-click - Swing, Throw plant
  • Right-click - Watering Can
  • E - Pick up plant
  • Tab - Open Shop, Sell Plant
  • Shift - Dash
  • Alt + Enter - Toggle Fullscreen

Fleur Defense was made for Ludum Dare 46 where the theme was "Keep it Alive!"

Original Soundtrack created during the jam by Juniper Paradise

https://juniperparadise.bandcamp.com/album/fleur-defense-original-soundtrack
